root.name: Cho Aniki Zero
root.description: PS Vita CompatibilityDespite not being in the official compatibility list, Cho Aniki Zero can be played on the PS Vita. To do this, the user must first download the game to the PS3. From there, go to Content Transfer on the PS Vita and select the game for transfer. Once complete, the game will show up on the Vita's menu.On May 16th, 2012, the title was announced as officially compatible with the Vita.
